unnormalised: **Quora Post: Builder Reviews - Real Estate & Property**
normalised: **Quora Post: Builder Reviews - Real Estate and Property**

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of investing in a new apartment in Mumbai or maybe a villa near Bangalore? We all know how crucial it is to pick the right builder, right?
normalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of investing in a new apartment in Mumbai or maybe a villa near Bangalore? We all know how crucial it is to pick the right builder, right?

unnormalised: So, what are your go-to sources for builder reviews? I've found that online forums can be a mixed bag - you get genuine experiences alongside what seems like blatant marketing. Word-of-mouth is great, but limited to my immediate circle.
normalised: So, what are your go-to sources for builder reviews? I've found that online forums can be a mixed bag - you get genuine experiences alongside what seems like blatant marketing. Word-of-mouth is great, but limited to my immediate circle.

unnormalised: I'm particularly interested in reviews for projects by Lodha Group and Prestige Constructions. Anyone have firsthand experience with them, especially regarding handover timelines (like if the promised delivery date was 1st October 2024 vs. actual)? Or quality of construction - no one wants seepage problems after paying crores of Rupees!
normalised: I'm particularly interested in reviews for projects by Lodha Group and Prestige Constructions. Anyone have firsthand experience with them, especially regarding handover timelines (like if the promised delivery date was first October two thousand and twenty four versus actual)? Or quality of construction - no one wants seepage problems after paying crores of Rupees!

unnormalised: Also, any reliable platforms dedicated specifically to Indian builder reviews? I tried searching "builder reviews India" but the results were pretty generic.
normalised: Also, any reliable platforms dedicated specifically to Indian builder reviews? I tried searching "builder reviews India" but the results were pretty generic.

unnormalised: Ideally, I'd love to see a platform where people can verify their bookings (like provide a booking confirmation number) to prevent fake reviews.
normalised: Ideally, I'd love to see a platform where people can verify their bookings (like provide a booking confirmation number) to prevent fake reviews.

unnormalised: For example, I heard a rumour that someone got possession of their Tata Housing flat a whole 6 months after the promised date - a real bummer especially if you've already planned your Griha Pravesh ceremony for 09:00 hrs on 15/08/2024! Share your insights and help us make informed decisions! What are your thoughts?
normalised: For example, I heard a rumour that someone got possession of their Tata Housing flat a whole six months after the promised date - a real bummer especially if you've already planned your Griha Pravesh ceremony for nine hundred hours on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four! Share your insights and help us make informed decisions! What are your thoughts?
